create.label: Create
create.logingate: You must log in to create content.

account.versionGate: This version of Photon supports instances running {{version}} or higher.

2fa.paste: Paste this in your authenticator app.

deleteAccount.label: Delete account
deleteAccount.warning: This will delete ALL of your submissions.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: If any are set, you will only see content explicitly tagged as that language. Most content, untagged, falls under 'Undetermined'.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.description: Choose an instance that interests you, or type the URL manually.
signup.info: An instance is the server that your account will be hosted on, but you can still access and interact with content from other instances.

application.label: Application
application.info: To join this instance, you must fill out this application, and wait to be accepted. You will receive an email if your application is accepted.
application.notice: Your signup is now pending. Once an administrator reviews it, you will receive an email if it was accepted. You then can log in.

closed.title: Registrations closed
closed.description: This instance has registrations closed. Find another instance.

verify.title: Verify email
verify.description: Check your inbox for a verification link. Once you've clicked it, press the button below.
verify.error: Your email has not been verified.

frontpage.title: Frontpage
frontpage.endFeed: You have reached the end of {{community_name; undefined:the feed.; default:{{community_name}}.}}

legal.title: Legal
legal.noLegal: This instance does not have any legal information.

empty.title: No blocked entities
empty.description: When you block anything, it will no longer appear in your feeds.

delete.title: Delete account
delete.warning: This is permanent. Are you sure you want to do this?

noResults.title: No results
noResults.description: There are no results that match that filter. Try refining your search.

post.instanceWarning: This post was requested from a different server than your account's. Many actions won't work.

thread.part: You're viewing part of a thread.

postRedirect.title: Mismatching instance
postRedirect.description: That link resolves to a post not on your account's instance, {{homeInstance}}.

empty.title: No new notifications
empty.description: Messages, replies, and mentions will appear here.

messages.conversation: This is the beginning of your conversation with {{user}}

empty.title: No new reports
empty.description: When submissions are reported, you can act on them here.

config.title: Configuration
config.emailAdminsOnApplication: Email admins on receiving new applications
config.emailAdminsOnReport: Email admins on receiving new reports

empty.title: No new applications
empty.description: Applications to join your instance will appear here.

empty.title: No taglines
empty.description: A random tagline will appear on the site card when users visit your instance.

empty.title: No admins
empty.description: Somehow there's no admins of this site. How??

emptyBlock.title: No blocked instances
emptyBlock.description: Blocking an instance will hide new submissions from that instance.

emptyAllow.title: No whitelisted instances
emptyAllow.description: Whitelisting an instance will block every other instance.

verifyEmail.message: Your email was verified. You can now close this window.

passwordChange.title: Change Password
passwordChange.instance: Which instance is your account hosted on?

resetLogin.title: Reset Password
resetLogin.description: Enter your account's email, and a password reset link will be sent. If your account does not have an email, contact your instance admins.

resetWarning.title: Reset Theme
resetWarning.description: This will reset all of your colors to the default. It is recommended to export your theme before this.

preset.title: Can't be modified
preset.description: This is a default theme, and can't be modified.

community.languageWarning: Content in this community is in languages you do not have selected. Some or all posts may be missing.

purgeCommunity.title: Purging Community
purgeCommunity.warning: This will delete all posts. Are you sure? (The button will enable in 3 seconds.)

noData.title: No data
noData.description: There is no bias data for this website.

comment.banned: You are banned from this community.

ban.warning: This will delete ALL of this user's submissions here.

removeSubmission.title: Removing Submission
removeSubmission.failReply: Failed to post reply. Removing anyway...
removeSubmission.failMessage: Failed to message user. Removing anyway...
removeSubmission.failEmptyReply: Your reply cannot be empty if 'Reply with reason' is enabled.

toast.loginVoteGate: You must be logged in to vote.
toast.invalidDateAbsolute: Invalid date. It must be an absolute date.
toast.invalidDateBeforeCurrent: Invalid date. It is before the current time.
toast.generatedTitle: Generated title and body from the URL. Do you want to undo this?
toast.failGenerateTitle: There was no usable title or description of that website.
toast.restoredFromDraft: Restored your post from the draft.
toast.removeAdminWarning: Are you sure you want to remove that admin?
toast.failInstanceURL: Failed to contact that instance URL. Is it down?
toast.resetLink: A password reset link was sent to your email.
toast.fetchPostOnHome: Attempting to fetch this post on your home instance...
toast.saveSettings: Saved your user settings. If you changed your email, a verification link was sent.
toast.confirmDelete1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
toast.confirmDelete3: Final warning. Are you really sure?
toast.resetSettings: Do you want to reset your settings to the default?
toast.verifyEmail: A verification link was sent to your email. Verify your email, then log in.
toast.waitApplication: Wait for your registration application to be accepted before logging in.
toast.settingsImportWarning: The imported settings don't seem valid. Are you sure you want to import this?
toast.lemmyDonate:
Your account's instance runs Lemmy, and the developers are requesting donations. They are able to develop Lemmy as an open source platform, free of tracking and ads, thanks to the generosity of its users.

Annually, they ask you to consider donating to support their work, and allow them to continue maintaining and improving Lemmy.

[Donate](https://join-lemmy.org/donate)

*Note: this is a donation to Lemmy, not Photon.*

dockPos.title: Dock position
dockPos.description: Where the dock should be positioned on the screen.

panel.title: Panel mode
panel.description: Extend the dock to the screen edges, similar to a panel.

pins.title: Pins
pins.description: Click a pin to send it to the top of the sidebar. Right click a pinned item to remove it.

autoHide.title: Auto hide dock
autoHide.description: Hides the dock on mobile when you scroll down, re-appears when you scroll up.

lang.title: Language
lang.description: The language used for text in the UI.
lang.note: Languages other than English and Hebrew are community translated, and may be incomplete.

useRtl.title: Use RTL layout
useRtl.description: Use an RTL layout for RTL languages.

view.title: Post style
view.list: Show posts in a list, with post bodies and compact media.
view.cozy: Show posts with large images, rich embeds, and longer post bodies.
view.compact: Show posts in a list, without post bodies and with tighter spacing.

sort.title: Default sort
sort.description: The default sorting to use in feeds.

infiniteScroll.title: Infinite scroll
infiniteScroll.description: New posts are added as you scroll down, without having to click 'next'.

postsInNewTab.title: Open posts in new tab
postsInNewTab.description: Open posts in a separate tab instead of the current.

displayName.title: Use display name
displayName.description: Show users' display names instead of their actual usernames.

limitLayoutWidth.title: Limit layout width
limitLayoutWidth.description: Improve readability by limiting the main content width.

placeholders.title: Random placeholders
placeholders.description: Show random placeholders for certain text inputs.

expandImages.title: Expand images
expandImages.description: Clicking on a post's image brings you to an expanded view rather than the post page.

duplicateTitles.title: Hide duplicate titles/bodies
duplicateTitles.description: Hides the post title and body if they are identical to the embed.

thumbnailSide.title: Thumbnail alignment
thumbnailSide.description: Where thumbnails should be on the post in list/compact mode

font.title: Font
font.description: The font used for text in the UI.

titleTags.title: Parse tags in title
titleTags.description: Take text in [brackets] and turn it into tags that you can click to search for.

reverseActions.title: Reverse action row
reverseActions.description: Reverses the order of actions on posts and comments.

absoluteDates.title: Absolute timestamps
absoluteDates.description: Replaces relative timestamps (3 hours ago) with absolute ones (15/6/25)

titleOpensUrl.title: Title opens URL
titleOpensUrl.description: Makes clicking the title open the post's attached URL, rather than the comments.

voteRatioBar.title: Vote ratio bar
voteRatioBar.description: When the controversiality of a post reaches greater than 15%, a bar will be displayed in the vote buttons to help visualize sentiment.

clickToView.title: Click to view
clickToView.description: Only load embeds once you click on them.

youtube.description: The website to embed YouTube content in.

instance.description: The instance to embed YouTube content in.

showHiddenPosts.title: Show hidden posts
showHiddenPosts.description: Show the posts you've manually hidden.

markReadPosts.title: Mark read posts
markReadPosts.description: Mark a post as read when you click on it

fadeReadPosts.title: Fade read posts
fadeReadPosts.description: Fade the title of posts you've already read

nsfwBlur.title: NSFW blur
nsfwBlur.description: Blur images and remove post bodies of NSFW posts.

instances.title: Show instances
instances.description: Show the instances where certain content is from.

replyPresets.title: Removal reply presets
replyPresets.description: Presets to use for 'reply reason' in the submission removal dialog.

virtualizeFeeds.title: Don't virtualize feeds
virtualizeFeeds.description: Virtualization only renders visible posts, increasing performance drastically. Disable virtualization if you are having stutter problems. This will disable infinite scroll.

donate.description: This app is open-source, and I've put my best effort into developing and maintaining it. If you'd like to support ongoing development, you can donate, or just recommend this to others!

error.incorrect_login: Incorrect login credentials. Please try again.
error.incorrect_login_3: Incorrect, again. Try a few more times.
error.incorrect_login_5: Look at your keyboard while typing this time.
error.incorrect_login_7: Okay, you're messing with me now.
error.incorrect_login_9: Each of these requests you make are sending data through via an incredible technology. And you're using it to make failed logins.
error.incorrect_login_10: Think about this. The poor instance admins have to maintain their server just for you to make these useless requests.
error.incorrect_login_11: Each press of the button uses thousands of CPU cycles to process your request, which ends up failing.
error.registration_application_is_pending: The registration application for that account hasn't been accepted yet.
error.couldnt_find_post: That post doesn't exist, isn't on this instance, or was removed.
error.cant_block_yourself: You can't block yourself. You shouldn't either, you're a nice person!
error.passwords_do_not_match: Your input password and the verification password do not match.
error.honeypot_failed: How did you- are you a bot? Beep bop bap boop. If you're not, the Honeypot check failed.
error.downvotes_are_disabled: Downvotes are disabled on this instance.
error.email_already_exists: An account already exists with that email.
error.slurs: Your submission contains a term banned in this instance.
error.cant_block_local_instance: You can't block the instance you are actively using.
error.invalid_vote_value: You can't commit voter fraud on Lemmy posts, sorry.
error.language_not_allowed: That language isn't allowed in this community. Unset it to use the community's default.
error.not_an_admin: You are not an admin of this instance.
error.rate_limit_error: You are performing that action too fast.

placeholders.title: Add a post title
placeholders.body: What do you have to say?
